SELECT g.grd_annual AS total,
NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN lr.approval_status = 'AS02' THEN (lr.leave_end_date - lr.leave_start_date + 1) ELSE 0 END ), 0) AS used,
(g.grd_annual - NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN lr.approval_status = 'AS02' THEN (lr.leave_end_date - lr.leave_start_date + 1) ELSE 0 END ), 0) ) AS remaining,
NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN lr.approval_status = 'AS01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS pending, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN lr.approval_status = 'AS02' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS approved, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN lr.approval_status = 'AS03' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS rejected FROM employees e JOIN grade g ON e.grd_idx = g.grd_idx AND e.co_idx = g.co_idx LEFT JOIN leave_requests lr ON lr.emp_idx = e.emp_idx AND lr.co_idx = e.co_idx AND lr.leave_start_date >= e.emp_regdate WHERE e.emp_idx = #{empIdx} AND e.co_idx = #{coIdx} GROUP BY g.grd_annual
SELECT leave_start_date, leave_end_date, approval_status, req_type FROM leave_requests WHERE emp_idx = #{empIdx} AND co_idx = #{coIdx} ORDER BY request_date DESC

SELECT lr.leave_req_idx, lr.emp_idx, lr.approver_idx, lr.leave_Start_date, lr.leave_end_date, lr.reason, lr.request_date, lr.approval_status, lr.approved_date, lr.att_file, lr.co_idx, lr.req_type, e.emp_name, d.dept_name FROM leave_requests lr LEFT JOIN employees e ON lr.emp_idx = e.emp_idx LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_idx = d.dept_idx WHERE lr.leave_req_idx = #{leaveReqIdx}
